name: Weather app
desc: A simple and accurate weather app that provides real-time forecasts, temperature, humidity, wind speed, and severe weather alerts for your location.

name: Tic Tac Toe
desc: Tic Tac Toe is a two-player game where players take turns marking X or O in a 3Ã—3 grid. The first to align three of their marks horizontally, vertically, or diagonally wins the game.

desc: This loader appears when you're opening the chat, sending a message, or waiting for a response.
